articles.title: Ukrainian forces’ missile strikes kill 63 Russian soldiers - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Sixty-three Russian troops have been killed in missile strikes conducted by the Ukrainian forces in Russian-controlled Makiivka town located in a part of the Donetsk region, VOA reported. According to the American medium, the unusual casualty announcement by …
articles.content:

articles.title: U.S. hammers Germany to move on - IIHF

articles.content: This was the first playoff meeting between the U.S. and Germany in tournament history. It was certainly memorable for the Germans, albeit not for the right reasons. The U.S. exploited its puck moveme… [+3670 chars]
